backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with extensive types for media processing jobs, including audio/video processing flags, metadata, and storage/mixin integrations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base variables and OKLCH-themed light/dark color tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the app root and lamejs for MP3 encoding.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing authentication state, profile setup, and routing to login or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedAudioEdi: Audio editor UI implementing auto/manual DSP configuration, waveform/spectral displays, and processing via browser DSP pipeline.
frontend/src/components/AudioABPreviewPl: Audio player allowing A/B comparison between original and edited tracks with playback, seeking, and volume controls.
frontend/src/components/DualWaveformDisp: Canvas-based waveform visualizer using Web Audio API to draw real‑time audio data from a provided audio element.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: Handles media upload, validation, processing flow, and video preview logic with extensive UI controls for editing options.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/JobsList.tsx: Displays user's processing history placeholder with mode-specific icons and messaging.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing page prompting login, featuring marketing content and feature highlights for the editing suite.
frontend/src/components/NLEEditor.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a future non-linear editor component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting users to enter and save their name when creating a new profile.
frontend/src/components/SpectralFrequenc: Canvas-based frequency visualizer that initializes an AudioContext analyser and renders animated spectral bars for a given audio element.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedVideoEdit: Large video editor component handling clips, playback, effects management, and timeline interactions with extensive UI controls and state management.
Side‑by‑side video comparison tool with synchronized playback, volume controls, and optional real‑time neural enhancement previews.
frontend/src/components/VideoPreviewMana: Simple UI panel for toggling preview effects, serving as a placeholder requiring backend integration for real‑time video enhancements.
frontend/src/docs/video-smoke-test-check: Markdown checklist outlining workflows and tests to verify end‑to‑end video editing, comparison, export, and UI behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto‑refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and uploading media via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styling with extensive CSS variables for themes including light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/aiAudioOrchestrator.ts: Utility for analyzing audio, generating AI processing plans from prompts, and summarizing selected audio enhancements.
frontend/src/lib/audioProcessor.ts: Web Audio–based DSP engine that applies multi-stage audio processing such as noise suppression, voice isolation, and EQ.
frontend/src/lib/autoAudioAssessment.ts: Extracts detailed audio features and suggests DSP settings using in-browser signal analysis.
frontend/src/lib/autoDspAutoTune.ts: Builds DSP processing options by auto-tuning settings based on analyzed audio features and intensity scaling.
frontend/src/lib/dsp/dspTypes.ts: Defines shared DSP option types and helper functions for mapping strength values to audio parameters.
frontend/src/lib/dsp/stageBuilders.ts: Implements Web Audio DSP stage builders for noise, transient, and voice processing using strength-based parameter mapping.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tabs for the video editor, file upload, and processing history.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s architecture, state version, design direction, and known issues for the Auvid app.
